message: While working at Asynchrony Solutions we order from http://www.maurizios.com/
Any incredible restaurant recommendations near the conference hotel?
One attendee created this Gowalla guide: http://gowalla.com/trips/138369
The restaurant at the top of Laclede Building is nice. About 2 blocks north of the hotel.
I've heard people mention enjoying Rooster (breakfast), Schlafly Tap Room, Bridge Tap House, Dubliner
I went to the Broadway Oyster Bar, about 4 blocks south - good music and Cajun food
Been to schlafly's before...any other good local brews that I need to check out downtown?
Other local breweries include Civil Life, Urban Chestnut, Six Row. Not sure where to find them though.
